long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhanced Focus Exercise
Boost your concentration in just 60 seconds! This simple yet powerful Chrome extension offers a quick mental workout to sharpen your focus and reinvigorate your mind.

Why I Created This
In my late 40s, I found myself increasingly reliant on generative AI tools for coding and problem-solving. While these tools are incredibly useful, I noticed my ability to focus and think critically was gradually diminishing. Concerned about cognitive decline and determined to keep my mind sharp, I created this extension. It's designed to provide a quick, engaging mental exercise that counteracts the passive thinking often associated with heavy AI use. Whether you're a young coder looking to maintain active thinking skills or someone like me fighting the effects of aging on cognitive function, this app offers a simple yet effective way to keep your mind agile and focused.

Why install?

Quick Refocus: Perfect for short breaks between tasks or when you feel your attention slipping.

Cognitive Boost: Engages your brain with number sequencing challenges to enhance mental agility.

Customizable Difficulty: Choose from easy, medium, or hard levels to match your current mental state.

Varied Gameplay: Multiple modes including ascending, descending, odd, even, and prime numbers keep the exercise fresh and challenging.

Memory Training: Optional memory mode adds an extra layer of cognitive engagement.

Productivity Aid: Improve your focus and return to your tasks with renewed concentration.

No Time Commitment: Complete a round in under a minute - perfect for busy schedules!

Sharpen your mind and elevate your productivity with this simple yet effective focus-enhancing tool. Install now and experience the difference a minute can make in your cognitive performance!
